rukus.text: Yiselie de houyi zhong bu xindao de ren, ceng bei da wu de he mai er yan zhizi er sa de she suo zuzhou, zhe shi youyu tamen de weikang he guofen
Tamen duiyu ziji suozuo de e shi, bu huxiang quan jie; tamen de xingwei zhen elie
Ni jiang kanjian tamen zhong you xuduo ren, yi bu xindao de renwei mengyou; tamen suo wei ziji yubei de, zhen elie. Na jiushi zi zhao an la de yanwu, tamen jiang yong zao xingfa
Jiaruo tamen quexin an la he xianzhi, yiji jiang shi ta de jingdian, tamen biding bu yi bu xindao de renwei mengyou, dan tamen duoshu shi fanzui de

Ni biding faxian, duiyu xindao zhe chouhen zuishen de shi youtai jiaotu he yi wu pei zhu de ren; ni biding faxian, duiyu xindao zhe zui qinjin de shi zicheng jidujiao de ren; yinwei tamen zhong you xuduo mushi he senglu, hai yinwei tamen bu zi da

Dang tamen tingjian songdu jiang shi shizhe de jingdian de shihou, ni kan tamen wei ziji suo renshi de zhenli er yanlei wangwang, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yi xindaole, qiu ni ba women tong zuozheng zhenli de ren jilu zai yi chu
Women shi qiewang women de zhu shi women yu shanliang de minzhong tong jin leyuan de, women zen neng bu xin an la he jiang shi women de zhenli ne!”
Yinwei tamen suo shuo dehua, an la yao yixia lin zhu he de leyuan baochou tamen, tamen de yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi xingshan zhe suode de baochou
Bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang de ren, shi huo yu de jumin
